name: Products
heading: From Idea to Product
description: Come up with ideas, turning them into real products, and grow your brand.

name: Analytics
heading: Chart Your Success
description: Check the numbers to see what's working and what your fans love.

name: Website
heading: Showcase Your Work
description: Your online space where you showcase your work, connect with your fans, and sell your products.

name: Inventory Management
heading: Keep Track of it All
description: Make sure you've got what you need, and stay on top of stock so you always have stock to sell to your fans.

name: POS System
heading: Sell Directly to Fans
description: Easily process sales, track inventory, and manage payments when selling in person

name: Order Management
heading: Handle Orders like a Pro
description: Stay on top of your orders, making sure everything gets shipped on time, and keeping customers in the loop from purchase to delivery.

name: Customer Relations
heading: Connect with Your Fans
description: Keep your fans happy, respond to their needs, and building a loyal community around your work.

name: Subscripton Service
heading: Effortless Subscriptions
description: Offer fans exclusive content in exchange for a regular fee, giving you a steady income and closer fan connections.

name: Local Store Management
heading: Wholesale With Ease
description: Make sure your products stay stocked, orders get fulfilled, and everything runs smoothly across all the stores that carry your work.

name: Shows/Event Management
heading: Track Your Shows
description: Keep track show dates and plan ahead so you can showcase your work and connect with fans.

name: Discount Codes
heading: Discounts -> Sales
description: Discount codes are a fun way to offer your loyal fans with special deals.
